page.title: 07Employment
page.content: We checked and we are sure that there are approximately one thousand people living within the area covered by our block. We interviewed sixty-five men and from the results we prepared a graph to show the different categories of employment. It soon became apparent that more people worked in industry than in any other sector of employment:- 20 worked in industry 10 worked in commerce 4 worked in education as teachers 7 worked in agriculture 12 worked in miscellaneous jobs e.g. shopkeepers;publicans;solicitors 4 worked in medicine e.g. doctors 6 were retired 2 were unemployed Those working in agriculture live and work within the area whilst almost all the rest commute outside the area.
